description.title: Tenscan RPC - read last 2 pages and check total and last page amounts
description.purpose: From the total transaction count the test works out the number of calls of a set page size to get all the transactions. It read retrieves the last two pages to retrieve the expected data, and tries to overrun the last page to ensure no consequences. Note the tx store is a LIFO and right shifted as new transactions are performed. Thus the test could fail if other clients are writing transactions whilst this test is running.
